Shade:ClawBack.NAME: Claw Back
Shade:ClawBack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a random shade:Buried card to your draw pile.
Shade:ClawBack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a random shade:Buried card to your draw pile.

Shade:AblativeArmor.NAME: Ablative Armor
Shade:AblativeArmor.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice a shade:Zombie to apply !M! Weak to all enemies and gain 1 Dexterity.
Shade:AblativeArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice a shade:Zombie to apply !M! Weak to all enemies and gain 1 Dexterity.

Shade:Boneskin.NAME: Boneskin
Shade:Boneskin.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice up to !M! shade:Zombies. Gain 2 plated armor for each shade:Zombie sacrificed.
Shade:Boneskin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice up to !M! shade:Zombies. Gain 3 plated armor for each shade:Zombie sacrificed.

Shade:FreshBones.NAME: Fresh Bones
Shade:FreshBones.DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Skeleton. NL Your shade:Skeletons deal 3 more damage for !M! turn.
Shade:FreshBones.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Skeleton. NL Your shade:Skeletons deal 3 more damage for !M! turns.

Shade:TouchOfTheGrave.NAME: Vengeful Dead
Shade:TouchOfTheGrave.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random shade:Buried attack and shade:Purge it.
Shade:TouchOfTheGrave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random shade:Buried attack and return it to your discard pile.

Shade:CallOfTheGrave.NAME: Call of the Grave
Shade:CallOfTheGrave.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random shade:Buried skill and shade:Purge it.
Shade:CallOfTheGrave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, play a random shade:Buried skill and shade:Purge it.

Shade:Bonestorm.NAME: Bonestorm
Shade:Bonestorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Summon !M! shade:Skeleton.
Shade:Bonestorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Summon !M! shade:Skeletons.

Shade:FingerOfDeath.NAME: Finger of Death
Shade:FingerOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If it kills the target, summon 2 shade:Zombies.
Shade:FingerOfDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If it kills the target, summon 2 shade:Zombies.

Shade:RavenousHorde.NAME: Ravenous Horde
Shade:RavenousHorde.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Summon 2 X shade:Zombies.
Shade:RavenousHorde.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Summon 2 X + 1 shade:Zombies.

Shade:LichForm.NAME: Lich Form
Shade:LichForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, summon !M! shade:Skeletons.
Shade:LichForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, summon !M! shade:Skeletons.

Shade:CallWraith.NAME: Call Wraith
Shade:CallWraith.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Summon a shade:Wraith. NL Exhaust
Shade:CallWraith.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Summon a shade:Wraith. NL Exhaust

Shade:RitualOffering.NAME: Ritual Offering
Shade:RitualOffering.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Shade:RitualOffering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards from your draw pile. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Shade:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
Shade:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity until next turn. NL Exhaust.
Shade:Frenzy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity until next turn. NL Exhaust.

Shade:ExtraLimbs.NAME: Extra Limbs
Shade:ExtraLimbs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL When Exhausted, increase the number of strikes by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Shade:ExtraLimbs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL When Exhausted, increase the number of strikes by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Shade:SelfBurial.NAME: Self-burial
Shade:SelfBurial.DESCRIPTION: Return all shade:Buried cards to your deck by exhausting your hand and next 10 cards. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
Shade:SelfBurial.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return all shade:Buried cards to your deck by exhausting your hand and next 10 cards. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Shade:GreyBargain.NAME: Grey Bargain
Shade:GreyBargain.DESCRIPTION: Return a shade:Buried card to your draw pile by exhausting a card in your hand.
Shade:GreyBargain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a shade:Buried card to your draw pile by exhausting a card in your hand. NL Draw a card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need a card to Exhaust.

Shade:FleshLikeOak.NAME: Flesh Like Oak
Shade:FleshLikeOak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
Shade:FleshLikeOak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Shade:CloudOfShrapnel.NAME: Cloud of Shrapnel
Shade:CloudOfShrapnel.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice a shade:Skeleton to deal !D! damage to all enemies and gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
Shade:CloudOfShrapnel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice a shade:Skeleton to deal !D! damage to all enemies and gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

Shade:SanguineRitual.NAME: Sanguine Ritual
Shade:SanguineRitual.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.
Shade:SanguineRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

Shade:FuneraryJewels.NAME: Funerary Jewels
Shade:FuneraryJewels.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! card. Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
Shade:FuneraryJewels.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! card. Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

Shade:DangerousRitual.NAME: Dangerous Ritual
Shade:DangerousRitual.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Costs 1 less per !M! cards Exhausted this combat.
Shade:DangerousRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Costs 1 less per !M! cards Exhausted this combat.

Shade:OminousRitual.NAME: Ominous Ritual
Shade:OminousRitual.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block and deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards Exhausted this combat.
Shade:OminousRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 3 *Dazed to your hand. NL Gain Block and deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards Exhausted this combat.

Shade:CommandSoldier.NAME: Command Soldier
Shade:CommandSoldier.DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Skeleton and trigger up to !M! shade:Skeleton attacks.
Shade:CommandSoldier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Skeleton and trigger up to !M! shade:Skeleton attacks.

Shade:LyeBath.NAME: Lye Bath
Shade:LyeBath.DESCRIPTION: Convert all your shade:Zombies into shade:Skeletons. NL Draw a card.
Shade:LyeBath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Convert all your shade:Zombies into shade:Skeletons. NL Draw two cards.

Shade:GoDigging.NAME: Go Digging
Shade:GoDigging.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice up to !M! shade:Skeletons. At the start of next turn, summon 2 shade:Zombies for each one sacrificed.
Shade:GoDigging.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice up to !M! shade:Skeletons. At the start of next turn, summon 2 shade:Zombies for each one sacrificed.

Shade:AuraOfUnlife.NAME: Aura of Unlife
Shade:AuraOfUnlife.DESCRIPTION: Increase the decay constant by 2, slowing the decay of your shade:Zombies and shade:Skeletons.
Shade:AuraOfUnlife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase the decay constant by 2, slowing the decay of your shade:Zombies and shade:Skeletons.

Shade:GraveStillness.NAME: Grave Stillness
Shade:GraveStillness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your shade:Zombies and shade:Skeletons decay by !M! less this turn.
Shade:GraveStillness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your shade:Zombies and shade:Skeletons decay by !M! less this turn.

Shade:PotionOfRestlessness.NAME: Potion of Madness
Shade:PotionOfRestlessness.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Strength. NL Decrease the decay constant by 1, speeding up the decay of your shade:Zombies and shade:Skeletons.
Shade:PotionOfRestlessness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 Strength. NL Decrease the decay constant by 1, speeding up the decay of your shade:Zombies and shade:Skeletons.

Shade:GreaterAnimation.NAME: Greater Animation
Shade:GreaterAnimation.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1 shade:Zombie, !M! shade:Skeletons, and 1 shade:Wraith. NL Lose 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

Shade:OfferingToTheBeyond.NAME: Ethereal Offering
Shade:OfferingToTheBeyond.DESCRIPTION: The next time you Exhaust !M! cards in one turn, summon a shade:Wraith.
Shade:OfferingToTheBeyond.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next time you Exhaust !M! cards in one turn, summon a shade:Wraith.

Shade:OpenGraves.NAME: Open Graves
Shade:OpenGraves.DESCRIPTION: Summon either a shade:Zombie or a shade:Skeleton at the beginning of your turn, alternating.
Shade:OpenGraves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Skeleton. NL Summon either a shade:Zombie or a shade:Skeleton at the beginning of your turn, alternating.

Shade:SensePrey.NAME: Sense Prey
Shade:SensePrey.DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Zombie and a shade:Skeleton for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.
Shade:SensePrey.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Summon a shade:Zombie and a shade:Skeleton for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust

Shade:Trample.NAME: Trample
Shade:Trample.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times your number of shade:Zombies.
Shade:Trample.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times your number of shade:Zombies.

Shade:PressTheAttack.NAME: Press the Attack
Shade:PressTheAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your shade:Skeletons deal 3 more damage for 1 turn.
Shade:PressTheAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your shade:Skeletons deal 3 more damage for 2 turns.

Shade:Patience.NAME: Patience
Shade:Patience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand and your unspent energy this turn.

Shade:Awaken.NAME: Awaken
Shade:Awaken.DESCRIPTION: Before your next turn, choose a shade:Buried card and return it to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Shade:Awaken.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Before your next turn, choose a shade:Buried card and return it to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Shade:Haruspicy.NAME: Haruspicy
Shade:Haruspicy.DESCRIPTION: Scry 5 and draw 2 cards. NL Sacrifice a shade:Zombie or lose 4 HP.
Shade:Haruspicy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry 6 and draw 3 cards. NL Sacrifice a shade:Zombie or lose 4 HP.

Shade:Brains.NAME: Brains
Shade:Brains.DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Zombie. NL Draw 2 cards.
Shade:Brains.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon two shade:Zombies. NL Draw 2 cards.

Shade:ScuttlingHand.NAME: Scuttling Hand
Shade:ScuttlingHand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you play a card that Exhausts, return this from the discard pile to your hand.
Shade:ScuttlingHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you play a card that Exhausts, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

Shade:Premonition.NAME: Premonition
Shade:Premonition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you summon a shade:Wraith, move this to your hand from wherever it is.
Shade:Premonition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you summon a shade:Wraith, move this to your hand from wherever it is.

Shade:SkeletonHug.NAME: Skeleton Hug
Shade:SkeletonHug.DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Skeleton. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.
Shade:SkeletonHug.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Skeleton. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

Shade:BoneShards.NAME: Bone Shards
Shade:BoneShards.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice up to !M! shade:Skeletons to deal !D! damage each.
Shade:BoneShards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice up to !M! shade:Skeletons to deal !D! damage each.

Shade:CoffinDance.NAME: Coffin Dance
Shade:CoffinDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your total number of shade:Zombies and shade:Skeletons is a multiple of 4, summon !M! shade:Zombies.
Shade:CoffinDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your total number of shade:Zombies and shade:Skeletons is a multiple of 4, summon !M! shade:Zombies.

Shade:UnbarTheGrave.NAME: Unbar the Grave
Shade:UnbarTheGrave.DESCRIPTION: Summon !M! shade:Zombies and !M! shade:Skeletons. NL Return !M! random shade:Buried cards to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Shade:UnbarTheGrave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon !M! shade:Zombies and !M! shade:Skeletons. NL Return !M! random shade:Buried cards to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Shade:Carnophage.NAME: Carnophage
Shade:Carnophage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, summon a shade:Zombie.
Shade:Carnophage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, summon a shade:Zombie.

Shade:Excise.NAME: Excise
Shade:Excise.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a card. If it's a Status or Curse, gain [E] and draw a card.
Shade:Excise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a card. If it's a Status or Curse, gain [E] and draw a card.

Shade:StitchTogether.NAME: Stitch Together
Shade:StitchTogether.DESCRIPTION: The next time you draw a Status or Curse card, Exhaust it, draw a card, and heal !M! HP.
Shade:StitchTogether.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next time you draw a Status or Curse card, Exhaust it, draw a card, and heal !M! HP.

Shade:FleshToFlesh.NAME: Flesh To Flesh
Shade:FleshToFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Summon !M! shade:Zombies. NL Add a *Wound to your discard pile.
Shade:FleshToFlesh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon !M! shade:Zombies. NL Add a *Wound to your discard pile.

Shade:LoseControl.NAME: Lose Control
Shade:LoseControl.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 *Wounds to your discard pile. NL Draw !M! cards.
Shade:LoseControl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 2 *Wounds to your discard pile. NL Draw !M! cards.

Shade:FleshOffering.NAME: Flesh Offering
Shade:FleshOffering.DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Wraith. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add 4 *Wounds to your discard pile.
Shade:FleshOffering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a shade:Wraith. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add 4 *Wounds to your discard pile.

Shade:FeralStrike.NAME: Feral Strike
Shade:FeralStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Add a *Wound to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Shade:FeralStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Add a *Wound to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Shade:DarkOfNight.NAME: Dark of Night
Shade:DarkOfNight.DESCRIPTION: Your next card that Exhausts this turn is played twice.
Shade:DarkOfNight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next two cards that Exhaust this turn are played twice.

Shade:Putrefaction.NAME: Putrefaction
Shade:Putrefaction.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a shade:Zombie dies, apply !M! Poison to all enemies.
Shade:Putrefaction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a shade:Zombie dies, apply !M! Poison to all enemies.

Shade:PoundOfFlesh.NAME: Pound of Flesh
Shade:PoundOfFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, summon !M! shade:Zombies.
Shade:PoundOfFlesh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, summon !M! shade:Zombies.

Shade:Consume.NAME: Consume
Shade:Consume.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top !M! cards of your deck. NL Add !M! *Wounds to your discard pile. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.
Shade:Consume.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top !M! cards of your deck. NL Add !M! *Wounds to your discard pile. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

Shade:Coordination.NAME: Coordination
Shade:Coordination.DESCRIPTION: Your shade:Skeletons' attacks hit all enemies.
Shade:Coordination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your shade:Skeletons' attacks all enemies. NL Trigger up to 2 shade:Skeleton attacks.

Shade:SoulToxin.NAME: Soul Toxin
Shade:SoulToxin.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Weak. NL Target loses 3 HP. NL If you have a shade:Wraith, apply !M! Poison.
Shade:SoulToxin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Weak. NL Target loses 5 HP. NL If you have a shade:Wraith, apply !M! Poison.

Shade:Asphyxiate.NAME: Asphyxiate
Shade:Asphyxiate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Deal damage equal to the enemy's Poison. NL Exhaust.
Shade:Asphyxiate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Deal damage equal to the enemy's Poison. NL Exhaust.

Shade:SpontaneousRitual.NAME: Spontaneous Ritual
Shade:SpontaneousRitual.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards Exhausted this combat.
Shade:SpontaneousRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 3 *Dazed to your hand. NL Exhaust your hand. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards Exhausted this combat.

Shade:CarefulCut.NAME: Careful Cut
Shade:CarefulCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust a card.
Shade:CarefulCut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust a card.

Shade:MadHubris.NAME: Lunar Madness
Shade:MadHubris.DESCRIPTION: Summon !M! shade:Skeletons. NL After the end of your turn, your shade:Skeletons attack you.
Shade:MadHubris.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Summon !M! shade:Skeletons. NL After the end of your turn, your shade:Skeletons attack you.

Shade:OneIsEnough.NAME: One Is Enough
Shade:OneIsEnough.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice all your undead for !B! Block each. NL Deal !D! damage X times.
Shade:OneIsEnough.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice all your undead for !B! Block each. NL Deal !D! damage X times.

Shade:LastGasp.NAME: Last Gasp
Shade:LastGasp.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Choose a shade:Buried card, play it, and shade:Purge it.
Shade:LastGasp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a shade:Buried card, play it, and shade:Purge it.

Shade:SpectralStrikes.NAME: Spectral Strikes
Shade:SpectralStrikes.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card containing "Strike," shade:Purge it, draw a card, and gain 1 Strength.
Shade:SpectralStrikes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you play a card containing "Strike," shade:Purge it, draw a card, and gain 1 Strength.
